com.microsoft.azure.documentdb.internal

Class AuthorizationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.documentdb.internal.AuthorizationHelper

  • public final class AuthorizationHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used by both client (for generating the auth header with master/system key) and by the G/W when verifying the auth header.

    • Constructor Summary

      AuthorizationHelper()

      This API is a helper method to create auth header based on client request using masterkey.

      • GenerateKeyAuthorizationSignature

        public static java.lang.String GenerateKeyAuthorizationSignature(java.lang.String verb,
                                                 java.lang.String resourceIdOrFullName,
                                                 ResourceType resourceType,
                                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> headers,
                                                 java.lang.String masterKey)
        This API is a helper method to create auth header based on client request using masterkey.
        Parameters:
        verb - the verb.
        resourceIdOrFullName - the resource id or full name
        resourceType - the resource type.
        headers - the request headers.
        masterKey - the master key.
        Returns:
        the key authorization signature.

      • getAuthorizationTokenUsingResourceTokens

        public static java.lang.String getAuthorizationTokenUsingResourceTokens(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> resourceTokens,
                                                        java.lang.String path,
                                                        java.lang.String resourceId)
        This API is a helper method to create auth header based on client request using resourceTokens.
        Parameters:
        resourceTokens - the resource tokens.
        path - the path.
        resourceId - the resource id.
        Returns:
        the authorization token.
